title: CAN Bike
detail: The power of a motor scooter meets the portablity of a bicycle
extended_details:
We will be creating the drive train system for an electric bicycle with serious power. Using a network of CAN connected custom devices, we will be able to create a modular system that can be co-opted for a range of two wheeled vehicles.

Expanded proposal here:
https://docs.google.com/a/andrew.cmu.edu/document/d/1xq8idQ5TElgAFIL09rDWm55WfTQZ9obmh2swXlSRi3E/edit?usp=sharing

Addendum: Phase II SURG proposal here:
https://docs.google.com/a/andrew.cmu.edu/document/d/1t7y8wXHB8i9a9z_QQghJH8i_7sLvpJCIHgPT0zeJ7mQ/edit?usp=sharing
